DOC.brief_summary: Hepatitis A vaccine give either alone together measles , mumps , rubella , varicella vaccine pneumococcal 7-valent conjugate vaccine first dose together measles , mumps , rubella , varicella [ Oka/Merck ] virus vaccine second dose . Immunogenicity safety data collect dose vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Concomitant Use Hepatitis A Vaccine With Measles , Mumps , Rubella Varicella Vaccine Pneumococcal 7-Valent Conjugate Vaccine Healthy 12-Month-Old Children ( V251-067 )
DOC.detailed_description: Vaccines : V251 , Hepatitis A Vaccine , Inactivated ( VAQTA™ ) administer Measles , Mumps , Rubella Varicella Vaccine ( ProQuad™ ) Pneumococcal 7-Valent Conjugate Vaccine ( Prevnar™ ) Duration Treatment : 2 Doses , 6 month apart . Vaccine : Hepatitis A Vaccine , Inactivated ( VAQTA™ ) , administer alone Duration Treatment : 2 Doses , 6 month apart .
DOC.criteria: 12 15monthold male female active liver disease A negative history hepatitis A , measles , mumps , rubella , chickenpox , and/or zoster Males females previously vaccinate hepatitis A , measles , mumps , rubella , and/or chickenpox vaccine Any immune deficiency History allergy vaccine component History seizure disorder
